Name: team_size_condition
Description: Condition based on the size of the team

Name: sprint_achievement_condition
Description: Condition based on the achievement of sprint goals

Name: feature_completion_condition
Description: Condition based on the completion of features

Name: user_story_completion_condition
Description: Condition based on the completion of user stories

Name: task_completion_condition
Description: Condition based on the completion of tasks

Name: velocity_condition
Description: Condition based on the average amount of work per sprint

Name: team_satisfaction_condition
Description: Condition based on the satisfaction of the team

Name: blocker_impact_condition
Description: Condition based on the impact of blockers on tasks

Name: feature_documentation_condition
Description: Condition based on the completeness of feature documentation

Name: release_plan_completion_condition
Description: Condition based on the completion of release plans

Name: roadmap_completion_condition
Description: Condition based on the completion of roadmap milestones
